sources.title: Island Of Doomed Men (1940)
sources.description: Madman Stephen Danel (Peter Lorre) presides over a prison on a remote island in the Pacific, where he works the convicts to death and profits from their labor. Aware that Danel has a hand in a slave trading ring and that all is not well on the island, government agent Mark Sheldon (Robert Wilcox) po ses as a crook and has himself shipped out to the tropical penal colony. There, he teams up with Danel's abused wife, Lorraine (Rochelle Hudson), in an effort to bring down the psychotic slave driver.

sources.title: Island of Doomed Men (1940)
sources.description: Undercover agent Mark Sheldon gets paroled to a remote tropical island with a diamond mine manned by slave labor run by sadistic Stephen Danel. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/island-of-doomed-men-1940/

metadata.Plot: Sadistic Stephen Danel owns a penal island, and when he is not humiliating and mistreating his wife, he is torturing his convict prisoners and using them for slave labor. Government agent Mark Sheldon is sent to infiltrate the island and bring Danel to justice.
metadata.Actors: Peter Lorre, Rochelle Hudson, Robert Wilcox
